name: Optimizing for Collaboration in Figma - Figma Chicago Meetup (May 2019)
description: In May 2019, Figma Chicago had a Meetup focused on using Figma to collaboration on software teams with PMs, engineers, and designers. A recap of this presentation was also published on Medium https://medium.com/swlh/optimizing-for-collaboration-in-figma-84726464ba1b
